```scss
// Property: extendSafeArea
// Description: Specifies whether the screen insets/notches are allowed to overlap the window's content or not.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.NavigationWindow, Ti.UI.TabGroup, Ti.UI.Window, Ti.UI.iOS.SplitWindow
'.extend-safe-area': { extendSafeArea: true }
'.extend-safe-area-false': { extendSafeArea: false }
```
